options.value: Single academy trusts (SATs) that want to add other maintained schools or academies by using their existing legal entity, and becoming a new multi-academy trust (MAT)

options.label: MATs that want to add an academy or academies from SATs

options.value: MATs that want to add an academy or academies from a different MAT
options.label: MATs that want to add an academy or academies from a different MAT

options.value: MATs merging or consolidating, where all the academies from one trust are transferring to another trust
options.label: MATs merging or consolidating, where all the academies from one trust are transferring to another trust
